name: Coconut Cream Custard Recipe | Shireen Anwar | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Coconut Cream Custard Recipe: Condensed milk 1 tin (400 gram) Water 200 ml or 1 cup Coconut 1 cup Coconut milk half cup Eggs 4 Sugar half cup for caramel Coconut essence half tsp Cream for decoration
instructions: Melt sugar in a sauce pan until golden. Spread in a mold. Leave to set. Combine eggs, condense milk, water, coconut milk, and coconut in a blender, beat for 1 min, and pour in a mold. Bake over water bath, for 45 mins cool over night, over turn. Serve decorated with whipped cream.
